mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_PW , USER_NM , USER_TEL , USER_EMAIL , USER_ADDR1 , USER_ADDR2 , USER_TYPE FROM T_SGJ_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SGJ_USER( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NM, USER_TEL, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2 ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNm}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SGJ_USER SET USER_PW = #{userPw}, USER_NM = #{userNm}, USER_TEL = #{userTel}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_ADDR1 = #{userAddr1}, USER_ADDR2 = #{userAddr2} where USER_ID = #{userId}
